content.headline: The Bargain Stock Blitz: 7 Companies Ready to Stun the Street
content.summary: Although it can be exciting to wager on enterprises that everyone else is following, your best bets may stem from so-called bargain stocks. These ideas are from the path less traveled. While they’re higher risk, they could also be intensely rewarding. While there may be some semblance of safety in numbers, one problem tied to betting on the usual suspects is the reward potential or lack thereof. These ideas are the equivalent of minus-money bets.
